Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-43552 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-1, affected by CVE-2022-43552
